content: the zauberzopf sweater is knitted from the top down it features a wide neckline and positive ease allowing for growth especially in baby sizes to accommodate this the sleeve cuffs are extra long and folded in half for the smaller sizes in the children s sizes these grow-along cuffs are omitted the sweater is constructed using a raglan technique and is knitted in the round for the children s sizes german short row are used to shape the back for a better fit which is not necessary in the baby sizes the stitch pattern alternates between seed stitch and cables yarn consumption baby 100g for size 48/52 150g for size 56/62 150g for size 68/74 200g for size 80/86 200g for size 92 250g for size 98/104 children 350g for size 110/116 350g for size 122/128 400g for size 134/140 450g for size 146/152
